20110104220921.000|20110104220923.000|TR0|
20110104220923.000|20110104220926.000|TR0|DEBORAH FEYERICK, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  
20110104220926.000|20110104220928.000|TR0|Well, you know, it really is, Wolf.  And 
20110104220928.000|20110104220930.000|TR0|friends say John Wheeler was a highly 
20110104220930.000|20110104220932.000|TR0|accomplished man who moved easily between 
20110104220932.000|20110104220934.000|TR0|the military and private sector, and has 
20110104220934.000|20110104220937.000|TR0|worked with various charities.  He once 
20110104220937.000|20110104220939.000|TR0|joked he couldn't hold a job, but that's 
20110104220939.000|20110104220941.000|TR0|because he was in such high demand.
20110104220941.000|20110104220943.000|TR0|

20110104220946.000|20110104220948.000|TR0|him?
20110104220948.000|20110104220950.000|TR0|
20110104220950.000|20110104220952.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)
20110104220952.000|20110104220954.000|TR0|
20110104220954.000|20110104220957.000|TR0|FEYERICK (voice-over):  Police returned to 
20110104220957.000|20110104220959.000|TR0|the Delaware landfill hoping to find 
20110104220959.000|20110104221001.000|TR0|answers in the trash as to how John 
20110104221001.000|20110104221003.000|TR0|Wheeler died and why.  Wheeler, a former 
20110104221003.000|20110104221006.000|TR0|Pentagon official with top security 
20110104221006.000|20110104221008.000|TR0|clearance, was an expert in chemical and 
20110104221008.000|20110104221010.000|TR0|biological warfare, who served under three 
20110104221010.000|20110104221012.000|TR0|presidents.  He was best known for pushing 
20110104221012.000|20110104221014.000|TR0|through the Vietnam Veterans Memorial.  
20110104221014.000|20110104221017.000|TR0|His friend and lawyer describing Wheeler 
20110104221017.000|20110104221019.000|TR0|as...
20110104221019.000|20110104221021.000|TR0|
20110104221021.000|20110104221023.000|TR0|BAYARD MARIN, JOHN WHEELER'S ATTORNEY:  
20110104221023.000|20110104221025.000|TR0|Brilliant, forceful, determined, wanted to 
20110104221025.000|20110104221028.000|TR0|get done, wanted to get things done.
20110104221028.000|20110104221030.000|TR0|
20110104221030.000|20110104221032.000|TR0|FEYERICK:  Police believe Wheeler was 
20110104221032.000|20110104221034.000|TR0|murdered sometime between December 30th 
20110104221034.000|20110104221037.000|TR0|and 31st, then stuffed in a dumpster in a 
20110104221037.000|20110104221039.000|TR0|busy shopping area about 20 minutes from 
20110104221039.000|20110104221041.000|TR0|Wilmington, Delaware, where he was last 
20110104221041.000|20110104221043.000|TR0|seen -- not far from the famed Hotel du 
20110104221043.000|20110104221045.000|TR0|Pont.  Police questioned businesses on the 
20110104221045.000|20110104221048.000|TR0|trash collector's New Year's Eve route.  
20110104221048.000|20110104221050.000|TR0|Two of those businesses tell CNN police 
20110104221050.000|20110104221052.000|TR0|asked for surveillance video.  Wheeler's 
20110104221052.000|20110104221054.000|TR0|lawyer says the 66-year-old Vietnam 
20110104221054.000|20110104221057.000|TR0|veteran knew many people in Washington, 
20110104221057.000|20110104221059.000|TR0|DC, but had no known enemies.
20110104221059.000|20110104221101.000|TR0|
20110104221101.000|20110104221103.000|TR0|MARIN:  I think there's every possibility 
20110104221103.000|20110104221105.000|TR0|of that -- of it just being a random 
20110104221105.000|20110104221108.000|TR0|crime.  It's come to everyone's attention 
20110104221108.000|20110104221110.000|TR0|because of the background of the person 
20110104221110.000|20110104221112.000|TR0|involved and the fact that litigation was 
20110104221112.000|20110104221114.000|TR0|involved.  But it may be random.
20110104221114.000|20110104221117.000|TR0|
20110104221117.000|20110104221119.000|TR0|FEYERICK:  Wheeler was involved in 
20110104221119.000|20110104221121.000|TR0|litigation with a neighbor over the 
20110104221121.000|20110104221123.000|TR0|building of a home.  His lawyer says it 
20110104221123.000|20110104221125.000|TR0|was contentious, but there were never any 
20110104221125.000|20110104221128.000|TR0|threats.  Wheeler had a Washington, D.C. 
20110104221128.000|20110104221130.000|TR0|ticket on Amtrak.  His car was found in a 
20110104221130.000|20110104221132.000|TR0|parking garage not far from the station.
20110104221132.000|20110104221134.000|TR0|
20110104221134.000|20110104221136.000|TR0|(END VIDEOTAPE)
20110104221136.000|20110104221139.000|TR0|
20110104221139.000|20110104221141.000|TR0|FEYERICK:  That's right.  And that's one 
20110104221141.000|20110104221143.000|TR0|of the clues that police are looking into. 
20110104221143.000|20110104221145.000|TR0| He did have a Washington ticket on Amtrak 
20110104221145.000|20110104221148.000|TR0|and his car was found.  It's not clear 
20110104221148.000|20110104221150.000|TR0|whether it was abandoned or whether he had 
20110104221150.000|20110104221152.000|TR0|even made the journey.
20110104221152.000|20110104221154.000|TR0|

20110104221159.000|20110104221201.000|TR0|The FBI has evidence response teams that 
20110104221201.000|20110104221203.000|TR0|-- that help in murders like these.  And a

20110104221314.000|20110104221316.000|TR0|BLITZER:  A new year, a new controversy 
20110104221316.000|20110104221319.000|TR0|over immigrants and citizenship.
20110104221319.000|20110104221321.000|TR0|
20110104221321.000|20110104221323.000|TR0|Jack Cafferty is here.
20110104221323.000|20110104221325.000|TR0|
20110104221325.000|20110104221327.000|TR0|He's got "The Cafferty File" -- Jack.
20110104221327.000|20110104221330.000|TR0|
20110104221330.000|20110104221332.000|TR0|JACK CAFFERTY, CNN ANCHOR:  Fourteen 
20110104221332.000|20110104221334.000|TR0|states are considering passing laws that 
20110104221334.000|20110104221336.000|TR0|would deny citizenship to children born of 
20110104221336.000|20110104221339.000|TR0|illegal immigrants here in the United 
20110104221339.000|20110104221341.000|TR0|States.
20110104221341.000|20110104221343.000|TR0|
20110104221343.000|20110104221345.000|TR0|Arizona, ever at the front of the 
20110104221345.000|20110104221347.000|TR0|immigration debate, could take the first 
20110104221347.000|20110104221350.000|TR0|step when it comes to the issue of 
20110104221350.000|20110104221352.000|TR0|birthright citizenship. Arizona lawmakers 
20110104221352.000|20110104221354.000|TR0|plan to introduce model legislation in 
20110104221354.000|20110104221356.000|TR0|Washington tomorrow that would force the 
20110104221356.000|20110104221358.000|TR0|Supreme Court to weigh in on this issue. 
20110104221358.000|20110104221401.000|TR0|Lawmakers from more than a dozen other 
20110104221401.000|20110104221403.000|TR0|states plan to be there tomorrow, as well. 
20110104221403.000|20110104221405.000|TR0| That includes everywhere from other 
20110104221405.000|20110104221407.000|TR0|border states like Texas to Utah, 
20110104221407.000|20110104221410.000|TR0|Oklahoma, Michigan, Delaware and 
20110104221410.000|20110104221412.000|TR0|Pennsylvania.
20110104221412.000|20110104221414.000|TR0|
20110104221414.000|20110104221416.000|TR0|This all goes back to the 14th Amendment 
20110104221416.000|20110104221418.000|TR0|of the Constitution, which states that:  
20110104221418.000|20110104221421.000|TR0|"All persons born or naturalized in the 
20110104221421.000|20110104221423.000|TR0|United States are citizens of the U.S."
20110104221423.000|20110104221425.000|TR0|
20110104221425.000|20110104221427.000|TR0|The law initially was meant to give 
20110104221427.000|20110104221430.000|TR0|citizenship to freed slaves. Those behind 
20110104221430.000|20110104221432.000|TR0|the new push say it wasn't meant to apply 
20110104221432.000|20110104221434.000|TR0|to children of foreigners.  They say 
20110104221434.000|20110104221436.000|TR0|illegal immigrants and their children are 
20110104221436.000|20110104221438.000|TR0|draining taxpayer services and that 
20110104221438.000|20110104221441.000|TR0|they're attracting more illegal aliens 
20110104221441.000|20110104221443.000|TR0|into this country.
20110104221443.000|20110104221445.000|TR0|
20110104221445.000|20110104221447.000|TR0|And they've got a point.  A lot of our 
20110104221447.000|20110104221450.000|TR0|states are drowning in debt and deficits.  
20110104221450.000|20110104221452.000|TR0|See California.
20110104221452.000|20110104221454.000|TR0|
20110104221454.000|20110104221456.000|TR0|The total is estimated at $140 billion for 
20110104221456.000|20110104221458.000|TR0|all of the states for the next fiscal 
20110104221458.000|20110104221501.000|TR0|year.  And they're making drastic cuts as 
20110104221501.000|20110104221503.000|TR0|a result in all kinds of things -- 
20110104221503.000|20110104221505.000|TR0|education, health care, police forces, 
20110104221505.000|20110104221507.000|TR0|state workers.  You name it, the cuts are 
20110104221507.000|20110104221509.000|TR0|every place.
20110104221509.000|20110104221512.000|TR0|
20110104221512.000|20110104221514.000|TR0|Critics of an effort to end birth right 
20110104221514.000|20110104221516.000|TR0|citizenship say these attempts to take on 
20110104221516.000|20110104221518.000|TR0|the 14th Amendment could cost big bucks in 
20110104221518.000|20110104221521.000|TR0|legal challenges.  And they also say that 
20110104221521.000|20110104221523.000|TR0|the issue is a federal one.
20110104221523.000|20110104221525.000|TR0|
20110104221525.000|20110104221527.000|TR0|And, of course, we all know how seriously 
20110104221527.000|20110104221529.000|TR0|and how well the federal government has 
20110104221529.000|20110104221532.000|TR0|dealt with the problem of illegal

20110104221536.000|20110104221538.000|TR0|Here's the question: Should states deny 
20110104221538.000|20110104221541.000|TR0|citizenship to children born of illegal 
20110104221541.000|20110104221543.000|TR0|immigrants?

20110104221956.000|20110104221958.000|TR0|LISA SYLVESTER, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  Well, 
20110104221958.000|20110104222000.000|TR0|Wolf, you don't strike me as being a 
20110104222000.000|20110104222002.000|TR0|procrastinator, but for those of us that 
20110104222002.000|20110104222005.000|TR0|are, well, the tax filing deadline is now 
20110104222005.000|20110104222007.000|TR0|Monday, April 18.  And that's not because 
20110104222007.000|20110104222009.000|TR0|of previously announced processing delays, 
20110104222009.000|20110104222011.000|TR0|but because Washington, D.C. will be 
20110104222011.000|20110104222013.000|TR0|observing the Emancipation Day holiday on 
20110104222013.000|20110104222016.000|TR0|the original tax deadline, Friday, April 
20110104222016.000|20110104222018.000|TR0|15.  That holiday celebrates the freeing 
20110104222018.000|20110104222020.000|TR0|of slaves in the District.  Now the IRS is 
20110104222020.000|20110104222022.000|TR0|warning, though, don't count on getting 
20110104222022.000|20110104222025.000|TR0|any more time to file because of 
20110104222025.000|20110104222027.000|TR0|processing delays caused by new tax 
20110104222027.000|20110104222029.000|TR0|policies taking effect.

20110104222031.000|20110104222033.000|TR0|A Texas man is enjoying freedom after

20110104225124.000|20110104225126.000|TR0|the waste and fraud.  And once again, 
20110104225126.000|20110104225128.000|TR0|we've giving the insurance company the

20110104225326.000|20110104225328.000|TR0|Should states deny citizenship to children 
20110104225328.000|20110104225330.000|TR0|who are born of illegal immigrant parents?
20110104225330.000|20110104225332.000|TR0|
20110104225332.000|20110104225335.000|TR0|H. writes: "Arizona's proposal not to 
20110104225335.000|20110104225337.000|TR0|issue state birth certificates to children 
20110104225337.000|20110104225339.000|TR0|born of illegal aliens will do more to 
20110104225339.000|20110104225341.000|TR0|reduce the number of illegal aliens in 
20110104225341.000|20110104225344.000|TR0|that state than any previous law. Without 
20110104225344.000|20110104225346.000|TR0|a state-issued birth certificate, the 
20110104225346.000|20110104225348.000|TR0|child won't be able to collect benefits in 
20110104225348.000|20110104225350.000|TR0|any state.  Illegal aliens will no longer 
20110104225350.000|20110104225352.000|TR0|want to have their children born in 
20110104225352.000|20110104225355.000|TR0|Arizona, and thus will not settle there."
20110104225355.000|20110104225357.000|TR0|

20110104225650.000|20110104225652.000|TR0|
20110104225652.000|20110104225654.000|TR0|Jeanne, what are we learning?
20110104225654.000|20110104225657.000|TR0|
20110104225657.000|20110104225659.000|TR0|JEANNE MESERVE, CNN HOMELAND SECURITY 
20110104225659.000|20110104225701.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Well, Wolf, over the past 
20110104225701.000|20110104225703.000|TR0|24 months, nearly 50 U.S. citizens have 
20110104225703.000|20110104225705.000|TR0|been charged with serious terror 
20110104225705.000|20110104225708.000|TR0|violations.  Authorities are trying to get 
20110104225708.000|20110104225710.000|TR0|a better picture of who they are, hoping 
20110104225710.000|20110104225712.000|TR0|to find and stop other homegrown 
20110104225712.000|20110104225714.000|TR0|terrorists before they act.
20110104225714.000|20110104225717.000|TR0|
20110104225717.000|20110104225719.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)
20110104225719.000|20110104225721.000|TR0|
20110104225721.000|20110104225723.000|TR0|MESERVE (voice-over):  The list of 
20110104225723.000|20110104225725.000|TR0|terrorists accused of plotting or carrying 
20110104225725.000|20110104225728.000|TR0|out attacks against the U.S. is long and 
20110104225728.000|20110104225730.000|TR0|getting longer. A new study examines cases 
20110104225730.000|20110104225732.000|TR0|from shoe bomber Richard Reid to Times 
20110104225732.000|20110104225734.000|TR0|Square bomber Faisal Shahzad, and looks at 
20110104225734.000|20110104225736.000|TR0|25 variables to try to identify common 
20110104225736.000|20110104225739.000|TR0|characteristics.
20110104225739.000|20110104225741.000|TR0|
20110104225741.000|20110104225743.000|TR0|The head of counterterrorism for the Los 
20110104225743.000|20110104225745.000|TR0|Angeles Police Department says that kind 
20110104225745.000|20110104225748.000|TR0|of information can help local law 
20110104225748.000|20110104225750.000|TR0|enforcement piece together a terrorism 
20110104225750.000|20110104225752.000|TR0|investigation.
20110104225752.000|20110104225754.000|TR0|
20110104225754.000|20110104225756.000|TR0|DEP. CHIEF MICHAEL DOWNING, LOS ANGELES 
20110104225756.000|20110104225759.000|TR0|POLICE:  It's hard to put it together, but 
20110104225759.000|20110104225801.000|TR0|the more data points that we have, that we 
20110104225801.000|20110104225803.000|TR0|can connect up, we can get a sense of what 
20110104225803.000|20110104225805.000|TR0|this picture looks like.
20110104225805.000|20110104225808.000|TR0|
20110104225808.000|20110104225810.000|TR0|MESERVE:  A draft copy of the report by 
20110104225810.000|20110104225812.000|TR0|the New York State Intelligence Center was 
20110104225812.000|20110104225814.000|TR0|obtained by "The Wall Street Journal."  It 
20110104225814.000|20110104225816.000|TR0|found most of the terrorists were U.S. 
20110104225816.000|20110104225819.000|TR0|citizens, men between the ages of 18 to 
20110104225819.000|20110104225821.000|TR0|33.  Many had prior arrests, often for 
20110104225821.000|20110104225823.000|TR0|drugs.  Of the 61 percent who had attended 
20110104225823.000|20110104225825.000|TR0|college, the majority were engineering 
20110104225825.000|20110104225828.000|TR0|majors.
20110104225828.000|20110104225830.000|TR0|
20110104225830.000|20110104225832.000|TR0|With the proliferation of homegrown plots 
20110104225832.000|20110104225834.000|TR0|like those to blow up D.C.'s Metro and a 
20110104225834.000|20110104225836.000|TR0|Maryland military recruiting center, a 
20110104225836.000|20110104225839.000|TR0|flurry of studies has tried to create a 
20110104225839.000|20110104225841.000|TR0|picture of who these domestic terrorists 
20110104225841.000|20110104225843.000|TR0|are.  But some experts say it is also 
20110104225843.000|20110104225845.000|TR0|critical for law enforcement to know more 
20110104225845.000|20110104225847.000|TR0|about the process of radicalization.
20110104225847.000|20110104225850.000|TR0|
20110104225850.000|20110104225852.000|TR0|FRANK CILLUFFO, GEORGE WASHINGTON 
20110104225852.000|20110104225854.000|TR0|UNIVERSITY:  We need to be able to break 
20110104225854.000|20110104225856.000|TR0|down the case step by step by step by 
20110104225856.000|20110104225859.000|TR0|step, all the way to the very beginning of 
20110104225859.000|20110104225901.000|TR0|an idea as much as we can to see how it 
20110104225901.000|20110104225903.000|TR0|manifests itself.  And that will be more 
20110104225903.000|20110104225905.000|TR0|valuable from an operational 
20110104225905.000|20110104225907.000|TR0|counterterrorism preventative perspective.
20110104225907.000|20110104225910.000|TR0|
20110104225910.000|20110104225912.000|TR0|(END VIDEOTAPE)
20110104225912.000|20110104225914.000|TR0|
20110104225914.000|20110104225916.000|TR0|MESERVE:  Some law enforcement officials 
20110104225916.000|20110104225919.000|TR0|say the statistics in the new report are 
20110104225919.000|20110104225921.000|TR0|so generic, that they aren't useful 
20110104225921.000|20110104225923.000|TR0|investigatively.  And some experts caution 
20110104225923.000|20110104225925.000|TR0|that drawing a picture of a terrorist can 
20110104225925.000|20110104225927.000|TR0|give you tunnel vision and make you miss 
20110104225927.000|20110104225930.000|TR0|dangerous people who do not fit
